/opt/rocm-5.5.1/llvm/bin/clang++ -O3 -DNDEBUG --offload-arch=gfx90a --hip-link --rtlib=compiler-rt -unwindlib=libgcc CMakeFiles/bc.dir/bc.cu.o CMakeFiles/bc.dir/__/__/__/include/gunrock/util/gitsha1make.c.o -o ../../../bin/bc   -L/opt/rocm-5.7.1  -L/opt/rocm-5.7.1/lib  -L/opt/cray/pe/gcc/12.2.0/snos/lib/gcc/x86_64-suse-linux/12.2.0  -L/opt/cray/pe/gcc/12.2.0/snos/lib64  -L/opt/cray/pe/gcc/12.2.0/snos/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/rocm-5.7.1:/opt/rocm-5.7.1/lib /opt/rocm-5.5.1/lib/libamdhip64.so.5.5.50501 /opt/cray/pe/gcc/12.2.0/snos/lib/gcc/x86_64-suse-linux/12.2.0/libgcc.a -lhiprand -lhipsparse -lpthread -lstdc++fs /opt/rocm-5.5.1/lib/libamdhip64.so.5.5.50501 -lgcc -lgcc
